channel.title: [pi] you are already doing an emote [pi]
channel.description: hello, i have been searching for a tut on this also looking in sources for this but so far no luck. what i am looking for is a return code for emotes. currently i can click skillcape emote then do a different emote example, zombie hand. or i can spam click the skillcape emote and it will keep redoing the emote. if anyone has a fix for this please help. thankyou.

@couttiiee wrote:

hello, i have been searching for a tut on this also looking in sources for this but so far no luck.
what i am looking for is a return code for emotes.
currently i can click skillcape emote then do a different emote example, zombie hand.
or i can spam click the skillcape emote and it will keep redoing the emote.
if anyone has a fix for this please help.
thankyou.
